onboard.onboard_1_content:
Take a break, let's go on vacation with
your friends and family
onboard.onboard_2_content:
Tired of getting lost and wasting time?
Don't worry! We will guide you through
your journey
onboard.onboard_3_content:
Let the world know about your journey!
Leave a review everytime you finish your
journey!

sign_up.password_hint_2: Letters, numbers, dots, underscore. No space or special characters.
sign_up.password_hint_3: You can change your password anytime later

permission.permission_content:
Allow some permissions on your device
to have the best experience in LikeIt
